SEARCH
Package com.example.canada_geese.Managers

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.canada_geese.Managers.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Manages interactions with Firebase Firestore for mood events. Implements the singleton pattern to ensure a single instance for database operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseManager

      protected DatabaseManager()
      Private constructor for singleton pattern. Initializes Firebase Firestore and FirebaseAuth instances.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DatabaseManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of DatabaseManager.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of DatabaseManager.

    • addMoodEvent

      public void addMoodEvent(MoodEventModel moodEvent)
      Adds a mood event to the Firestore database under the logged-in user's collection. If the user is not logged in, logs an error.
      Parameters:
      moodEvent - the MoodEventModel object containing mood event details.

    • fetchMoodEvents

      public void fetchMoodEvents(com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> listener)
      Fetches all mood events for the logged-in user from Firestore. Orders the results by timestamp in descending order. If the user is not logged in, logs an error.
      Parameters:
      listener - the OnCompleteListener to handle the query result.

    • updateMoodEvent

      public void updateMoodEvent()
      Placeholder method for updating a mood event. Currently not implemented.

    • deleteMoodEvent

      public void deleteMoodEvent()
      Placeholder method for deleting a mood event. Currently not implemented.
